thread.title: Orange is the New Black gets a child-friendly makeover in these adorable Halloween costumes - Orange Is the New Black Fun
thread.title_full: Orange is the New Black gets a child-friendly makeover in these adorable Halloween costumes - Orange Is the New Black News - Fun - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Orange is the New Black gets a child-friendly makeover in these adorable Halloween costumes - Orange Is the New Black Fun
text: Get ready to go "aww..." at photographer Gina Lee's Halloween creations.As part of a tradition for her three-year-old daughter, October becomes Dress Up Willow Month for Lee and this year Netflix has given it their seal of approval.Her warden tucks her in every night. #Willoween #DressUpWillowMonth : @ginalee pic.twitter.com/hGxTt3Zr9D— Netflix US (@netflix) October 16, 2015One of this year's batch of costumes has seen Willow dressed up as Red from Orange is the New Black, with Netflix tweeting: "Her warden tucks her in every night".Other influences for this year include Wayne's World and Baywatch, as well as The Magic School Bus, which returns for a new series on Netflix in 2016.wahoooo.. ! ok bus.. do your stuff…. Thank you @RedlandsUSDSupt @netflix#NetflixHalloween#dressupwillowmonth pic.twitter.com/vfYrFYxm2h— ginalee (@ginalee) October 15, 2015E.T., Frida Kahlo and a miniature In-N-Out employee featured in last year's batch of costumes.
